name: Category and Tag Specific Widgets
author: Dynamick

sections.description: Using this plugin, you can display a text widget for any specific category and/or its sub-categories or for a specific tag. For example, you want to show different sidebar banners based on different category. It is easy using this plugin. Just create a new widget and select the category or tag.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin through Plugins > Add New > Upload interface or upload to wp-content/plugins directory using FTP.
  2. Activate the plugin once uploaded from the wordpress plugin administration page.
  3. Go to Appearance -> Widgets. Drag the ‘Category Tag Specific Widgets’ to your loved sidebar. You can add as many as you want.
  4. Fill the form as you expect the output. You’r done.
